tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE electric_vehicles (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    battery_capacity DECIMAL,
    mileage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE battery_performance (
    battery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    charging_cycles INT,
    battery_health DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE charging_stations (
    station_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    charge_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    production_year INT,
    battery_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE battery_metrics (
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    battery_level FLOAT,
    charging_status VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE range_metrics (
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    range_remaining FLOAT,
    estimated_range FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE acceleration_metrics (
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    acceleration_time FLOAT,
    speed_limit FLOAT
    PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE efficiency_metrics (
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumption FLOAT,
    efficiency_rating FLOAT
    PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id, timestamp)
)
